review_title: Committed charity with hard working staff and caring leaders
pros:
- Very dedicated staff base working hard to support the CF community
- Strong leadership team
- Excellent flexible working practices
- Good internal promotion opportunities (although slightly limited by size of organisation)
cons: - Growth of organisation limited by general public awareness of CF, although the staff work hard to seek out opportunities

pros: well structured and managed organisation with good terms and conditions and a good ethos.

job_title: Head of Finance in London, England

review_title: Fast-paced, engaging employer with a strong cause
job_title: Head of Department in London, England
pros: Great team of people, strong mission, fantastic community to work with.
cons: Tension between the need to find a cure for the future and the need to deliver services to people alive now.
